name: Elewar: Fused Survivors
description:
Upgrade your spells from basic functionality to a devastating power!



Complete over 70 challenges to gain the advantage of over 70 interesting unlocks, with quite a lot of new additions to the game!



Choose from over 30 different events which may trigger throughout a run for even more variety!




Play through multiple realms, each one providing a different type of playstyle to all of the character classes!
Craft your own weapon to take with you and overcome the 9 trials of each realm!

Will you become the archmage of Elewar or will you be brought down by your opponents? Bulletheaven might quickly become a bullethell if you aren't strong enouph!
Every enemy has at least 1 special attack... which you can dodge! There is no simple contact damage, which makes the game very challenging

Feature list:
  • 4 elements, over 16 different offensive spells and 7 utility spells
  • every spell may be upgraded in its rarity separately, which enables a diverse and powerful spell progression in a run
  • Prophecy Whirls, which give you a choice of a random event, may challenge and reward you depending on the chosen difficulty
  • over 5 character classes with wildly different playstyles
  • over 70 unlocks and challenges
  • over 50 upgrades
  • choose an unlocked blessing before you start a run, making cool combinations out of classes, blessings and starting spells possible!
  • at least 2 realms with different enemies, rules and trials
  • crafting system to make your own weapons and helmets, which give you an additional edge in the Trials of Elewar
  • several hidden secrets to discover
  • and much much more to come!
